hero.subheader: Course Reviews is a course review website by Cornell students, for Cornell students. You can browse classes and view their metrics, read about other studentsâ€™ experiences, and submit your own course reviews for others. Pre-Enroll has never been easier.

1.title: Search for Classes.
1.description: Search for Cornell classes using our wicked fast search.

2.title: Write a Review.
2.description: Write about the class, plus rate its difficulty and workload.

3.title: Check Out Class Reviews.
3.description: Read what other students have to say about the class.
